TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BitmapCodecInfo extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides information about an imaging codec.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo> can be obtain for each codec in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder.CodecInfo%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder.CodecInfo%2A> properties.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo.Author%2A> property of a given <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder>.
[!code-csharp[BitmapFrameExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/CSharp/BitmapFrame.cs#3)] [!code-vb[BitmapFrameExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/VB/BitmapFrame.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Author As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Author { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that identifies the author of the codec.

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property ContainerFormat As Guid
public: virtual property Guid ContainerFormat { Guid get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that identifies the container format for the codec.
Docs.value: The container format of the codec.

remarks.format:
